website_summaries.verdict: High-quality case for an ultra compact bow.
pros: Interior foam padding does a good job of protecting your crossbow
Zippered side pouch for storage of accessories

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for Barnett Whitetail Hunter 2 crossbow
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for Barnett Whitetail Hunter 2 crossbow. Nice quality. Side pocket will hold quiver with bolts and a few small items. I really like this case!
customer_reviews.author: Penguin

customer_reviews.title: Allen comes through again!
customer_reviews.text: This case is lightweight and very durable. My SA Sports Empire Beowulf fit perfectly inside it. The raised scope pocket accommodates up to a 15" scope. I was able to remove my quiver and it fit nicely in the side quiver pocket. I also put my discharge head, rail lube, and broadhead wrench inside the side pocket. Pros: lightweight, great fit, plenty of padding throughout, great side pocket for the quiver, great padded raised scope pocket Cons: would have been nice to have an additional pocket for the accessories All in all, a very nice protective case for your shorter axle to axle crossbows. Note: my bow's dimensions at their outmost points were 22"wide x 35.5"long x 10"tall
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Very good soft nylon crossbow case
customer_reviews.text: Very good soft nylon crossbow case..Fit's my Tenpoint FX4 really well..Plenty of room for scoped crossbow.. Also has a zippered pouch on the side for storage..Nothing fancy, but does the job of transporting and protecting my bow...
customer_reviews.author: Alan G.

customer_reviews.title: I liked this case..... Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I really did like this case and I wanted it to work. It Will Not Fit a Horton Storm RDX. I do not think this case will fit any RDX type bow. This is a high quality case and I liked everything about it. I just wish it had fit my bow I went ahead and gave it 5 stars because of quality. I am now having to return this case to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: T. Puff Dragon Retired

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my Barnett Ghost 375.
customer_reviews.text: I have a Barnett Ghost 375 that fits perfectly in the case! The scope fits up in the scope extra padded area and limbs are tight on the left and right, so doesn't move around. I can fit the quiver in the side case with 5 extra arrows, a case for the broadheads and the cocking rope. I wish it had one more pouch, but no issue. Overall a nice case that protects the bow without being huge. It's just a little bigger than the bow itself.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Brockmeyer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CROSSBOW CASE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm rating this crossbow case with 5 stars, due to it's very sturdy construction, as well as it being the only case that isn't too large for my SA Sports Empire Beowulf 360 crossbow. I'm going to purchase one more of these cases for my other ultra compact 22" crossbow when further funds are available. The arrow/accessories zip compartment attached to the right side has ample space for a five or six bolt quiver, rope cocking device or crank cocker, rail/string lube, etc, but not long enough to fit the plastic Allen crossbow bolt case. Overall I'm very pleased with this purchase and highly recommend this item to others needing a quality case for their ultra compact crossbow.
customer_reviews.author: GerryB

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit , Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Just received my Allen Sub-Compact Crossbow Case. Perfect fit for my PSE Fang. It is adequately padded to protect my bow and plenty of room in the side pouch for my quiver and other necessities. The carrying strap makes it easy to carry. As you can see by my rating I am very impressed. The priced this case vs the competition makes this a no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: RLFCARS

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: My barnett ghost 420 fits, just barely though. More padding than I expected from a soft case, which is a good thing. I wish there was more velcro 4p hold now in place. Comes with one padded velcro strap. I'll update on it's durability after I've had it a while.
customer_reviews.author: Bob  Kamphuis

customer_reviews.title: tight fit but fits
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality case, but I wish there were hard inserts to make the sides more rigid. I would like to take the pressure off the crossbow, but this is a desire and not out of necessity. The multiple handles help carry this from different angles, making it easier to transport. The side pocket will hold many bolts, but maybe not the quiver. Was a slightly tight fit for my model (CenterPoint Sniper 370), but it works.
customer_reviews.author: L. McNerneyTop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: Good Basic Protection
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a nice little soft case for everyday travel. It fits my Barnett Whitetail II perfectly and has a very large pocket for additional storage. The zipper appears to be robust as does the rest of the design.
customer_reviews.author: Carefulbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the Price!!!
customer_reviews.text: The Case is perfect, fits my Barnett Predator 430 (with the Side Mounted Quiver). I like the material, awesome strong zipper and handles, although the top handle could have taken a bit more padding. Overall great product for the price. The side pocket doesn't hold a 22" arrow (bolt) but I have a another Quiver and that fits inside with the crossbow. I use the side pocket for all other accessories. 5 starts for SURE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great cross bow case
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made soft sides carrier. My cross bow fits in it just right. It has pockets for the quiver and a protective pocket for the red dot scope, and a sling plus a carrying handle.
customer_reviews.author: Merlin Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Another pocket or two would make it better especially since it is a bit pricey in my ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit my Barnett Whitetail II quite well and and the MTM Bolt case fit in the side pocket. Had to place my 3 bolt quiver along side the stock towards the butt to fit it inside. Another pocket or two would make it better especially since it is a bit pricey in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sub compact case
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit for the Centerpoint Tormentor 380 Whisper. Once I adjusted the length pad, I had room in the back for rags, allen wrenches and more. Stores 2 boxes of Pile Driver bolts and my JaxX broadhead. Quality is very good, really like the side pocket for the quiver, wish it was also hard padded. Price is a little high, you get what you pay for. From SD SoCal
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Diaz

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice case and for the price I think is a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice case and for the price I think is a good deal. I just got a Invader G3 and it fit tight at first but after a very short period of time stretched and now fits like a glove. It kinda thick and stiff which I really like because it’s not just like fabric. Has everything I was looking for in a case except it doesn’t come in camo, 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Pracht

customer_reviews.title: Very nice crossbow case.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice case and well padded. It fits a Bruin 370 crossbow like a glove. I dropped one star because I wish it had more storage compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Thuesen

customer_reviews.title: Great case, but bad zipper location.
customer_reviews.text: Nice case except: zipper should have gone around the entire top of the case. When you open case, the top flap does not stay completely open.
customer_reviews.author: His Humble Servant

customer_reviews.title: very happy I did
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure when I ordered if it would work... very happy I did. Case for like a globe for my Barnett raptor fx with scope and quiver. Plus the dozen extra bolts and accessories I have. Great value great product. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher B Kane

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Fits my crossbow great (Barnett Razr Ice) and is of nice construction. Beware that 22" bolts in a kwiver will have to be somewhat crammed into the bolt storage pocket. It could stand to be an inch longer.
customer_reviews.author: T. Daughrity

customer_reviews.title: Case would have gotten 5 stars but i would have liked zippers going completely around the top
customer_reviews.text: The case would be better served to have zipper go completely down both sides. Also a bit longer arrow compartment would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: William Datson

customer_reviews.title: Works for the Barnett Brotherhood X-Bow
customer_reviews.text: I just received this crossbow case and I'm happy with this purchase. I have the Barnett Brotherhood Crossbow and it fits snuggly into the soft case. Definitely recommend this for transporting your crossbow in a vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Jahseminole

customer_reviews.title: I love how much padding it has and how well the ...
customer_reviews.text: This fits my TenPoint Turbo GT perfectly. I love how much padding it has and how well the compact crossbow fits.
customer_reviews.author: HJ

customer_reviews.title: I like this back a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like this back a lot, it's the smallest one I could find that would fit my recruit. It's well-made and feels good so far. I'm glad I came across this after looking at a handful of different bags
customer_reviews.author: prowl

customer_reviews.title: Fits as described
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly, one long compartment for arrows and stuff; wish there was more compartments but for the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up for me
customer_reviews.text: Wish this case had just a little bit of extra space as it's a pretty snug fit. Other than that it's pretty good quality material and a really nice case
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fit
customer_reviews.text: A perfect fit for my scoped Barret, lots of room for extras.
customer_reviews.author: Greg K.

customer_reviews.title: I took a chance on the 6028 and it was a perfect fit. I would highly recommend this case for ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a SA Sports Aggressior crossbow and I have tried serveral cases in the past and none them would fit it properly. I took a chance on the 6028 and it was a perfect fit. I would highly recommend this case for anyone that has a subcompact crossbow.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby L Turner Jr

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Use this case with my Barnett Terrain. I can get the bow, my quiver, discharge arrow, call, ranger finder and arrow puller in it. Everything I need bow related to hunt. Absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dave & Rita Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Good value and price.
customer_reviews.text: The case fit just right. Had a hard time finding one, because of the scope.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent case but...
customer_reviews.text: Nice case that has some padding, very flexible. I suggest cutting card board to fit in the bottom to make stiffer. WILL NOT FIT a tenpoint shadow nxt. Dimensions are good for the shadow BUT from the foot pad to cams it is too long. Wished it worked!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy kinda tight in some areas
customer_reviews.text: Great looking case My crosspoint 370 almost didn’t fit it was very snug in the bow area overall I do like it just takes a little to get my bow in
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my Barnett raptor fx. Appears to be quality made
customer_reviews.author: John Goul

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The men loved their cases. Fit the bows perfectly and well padded and strong.
customer_reviews.author: Snowy

customer_reviews.title: nice fit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cross bow bag plenty of storage and protects your crossbow well
customer_reviews.author: rls exhaust

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: Great case!! I have 2 barnett terrian cross bows and the case fits perfectly,plenty of room in scope hood and also the side pocket holds the quiver with bolts with just a little room to spare. excellent!!
customer_reviews.author: ras

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag. My fange crossbow fit just fine. My quiver with 20" bolts fit in the side pocket good too. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: dave240

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly and does a great job of protecting the contents while carrying back and forth between home and the field.
customer_reviews.author: Roger W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and compact
customer_reviews.text: Awsome case fits my ten point stealth fx4 perfect i like that its compact and not big and bulky like the hard case ones could have a little stifer bottom other then that its great
customer_reviews.author: Vt bow hunter

customer_reviews.title: Fits my Barnett whitetail PRO STR great
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Barnett Whitetail PRO STR great. Bolt pocket could be longer to hold a bolt case but it’s what I needed for just running to the woods an such without having to worry about tearing up my seats.
customer_reviews.author: darbyz71

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bow fit like a glove. Thankfully someone had posted it would.
customer_reviews.author: Steven N. Giacomo

customer_reviews.title: Allen Hardcore sub-compact crossbow case
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Ten-point Stealth FX4 perfectly plenty of room for the three arrow quiver, 12 spare arrows, and other components.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: he liked it very
customer_reviews.text: This was a christmas gift, he liked it very much
customer_reviews.author: Dolores Di Re

customer_reviews.title: Fits tenpoint tactical XLT perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This fits perfectly for a tenpoint tactical XLT. More thin I expected at a affordable price
customer_reviews.author: cong le

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality! Fits perfect for my Barnett recruit compound!
customer_reviews.author: Patrickeb

customer_reviews.title: Fits Tenpoint Titan SS about 4' slack left at stock ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits Tenpoint Titan SS about 4' slack left at stock end, that I use for broadhead box. Stock quiver fits in side pocket. Clearance for scope. Much less bulky then the hard case from manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This case fits my Barnett Raptor FX Crossbow with scope perfectly. You do need to remove the arrows from the quiver mounted on the crossbow however, or as I do, put the quiver with arrows in the quiver pocket which has room for a 16" hip quiver as well.
customer_reviews.author: Richard V.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for a TenPoint Venom - quiver fit in ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for a TenPoint Venom - quiver fit in side pocket with room to spare . Zippers seem quality made and stiching look good -we'll see how it holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This fit my ten point crossbow like a glove. Perfect case for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Reiling

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for ..
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for my sub compact Carbon Express Covert CX3SL. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the Price - I Like It...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty Good Product. Pleased for the Price Paid $39 (Used - New Condition). Fits the Barnett Raptor FX2 well as there is an adjustable padded Velcro pad inside the case that you place below the butt stock to secure. The only thing that I am not to stoked on is that the stitching is only double stitched, where if it be a lot more rugged/solid if case was triple stitched.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Loveit
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed! Fix my Barnett gamecrusher 2.0 perfectly. Nice padding nice zippers nice shoulder strap plenty of storage in side pocket
customer_reviews.author: John N.

customer_reviews.title: Not for Titan SS
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit the 10 point Titan SS properly. The limbs are too long resulting in a very tight fit. Otherwise seems like a quality case.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: This fits my Darton Toxin 150 SS perfectly. The ...
customer_reviews.text: This fits my Darton Toxin 150 SS perfectly. The only downside to it was that you can't fit the quiver with the bolts in it, in the side pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... be made very well fits my 10 point crossbow perfect! Plenty of room for stuff
customer_reviews.text: Case seems to be made very well fits my 10 point crossbow perfect! Plenty of room for stuff. 4 stars for now until I check out the durability.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: read the fine print
customer_reviews.text: case did not fit crossbow purchased despite being listed as a suggestion "to purchase also". Item had to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Hardcore Sub-Compact Crossbow Case, Black/Gray - Fits Most Sub-Crossbows, Barnett & Ten Point
product_meta.description: The Hardcore Sub-Compact Crossbow Case features heavy foam padding to protect limbs and cams. The interior has a soft lining with built-in length adjustment system. The case also has a 15″ padded scope compartment and a 23.5″ x 4″ x 5.5″ quiver pocket. Includes a padded adjustable shoulder sling. Case width: 22″, case length: 39″, case height: 10″, and hood depth: 12″.
feature_bullets: Foam padding protects limbs and cams
Padded adjustable shoulder sling, oversized zippers with web pullers
Soft lining with built-in length-adjusting system
Case measures 22" wide x 39" long x 10" deep, with a hood depth of 12"
